wikipedia_page.main: Sir Harold Warters Jackson (5 April 1883 – 4 December 1972) was an English solicitor who served as Lord Mayor of Sheffield in 1930. He was Knighted in 1952 for political and public services in Sheffield.

response: *Harold Warters Jackson (died 1972), English solicitor and Lord Mayor of Sheffield, 1930
* Alderman Harold Warters Jackson. For political and public services in Sheffield.
